name: dataproject
description: Michaels App Idea (True Review...?):     - Big Movie Database     - Review is blurred, won't be un-blurred until you have seen the film foryourself and left your own review     - Social Media-ish (Following Feed, what your friends are watching and friend recommendations)     - Film Verification, validate that you did indeed watch the film so you are allowed to review the film based on your genuine, bias free, opinion.     - Badge System     - Movie Poster, date & time, photo attachment (group you watched with or movie ticket), secondary reviews after the hype is over     - Snap Score type of feature     - Titles for certain events (i.e. "May the Force be with you." for watching star wars opening night)     - Link to streaming services and a "To be reviewed..." feature where episodes you watched go to a queue where you review
